text: "Ain't Love the Strangest Thing" is a song by Australian blues and rock band The Black Sorrows. It was released in July 1992 as the first single from their seventh studio album Better Times. It peaked at 46 on the ARIA Charts in September 1992. ==Track listing== ;Australian maxi single (658446 2) # "Ain't Love the Strangest Thing" – 5:08 # "I Will Follow You Down" – 4:26 # "What Does It Take (To Win Your Love)" (by The Revelators) – 3:53 ==Weekly charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" |- !scope="col"| Chart (1992) !scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |} ==References== Category:1992 songs Category:1992 singles Category:The Black Sorrows songs Category:Songs written by Joe Camilleri Category:Song recordings produced by Joe Camilleri
title: Ain't Love the Strangest Thing
